definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Her drive and determination won her a place close to Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 她的干劲和决心为她赢得了接近默多克的位置。

sentences.english: The atmosphere on an inpatient ward is tense because of this exerted energy.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种表露的干劲，住院病房的氛围很紧张。

sentences.english: The commune members went at the building of a dam with a will.
sentences.chinese: 社员们干劲十足地建筑一道堤坝。

sentences.english: It was hard work, but everybody went at it with a will.
sentences.chinese: 劳动很艰苦，可是大家干劲十足。

sentences.english: If results are not what we want, that is even a bigger motivation to fight.
sentences.chinese: 假如结果不如人意，那正是让我更加鼓足干劲的理由。

sentences.english: He perseveres in his work makes us shame.
sentences.chinese: 他孜孜不倦的干劲使我们大家惭愧。

sentences.english: Success or failure consists in revolutionary drive.
sentences.chinese: 成功或失败取决于革命的干劲。

sentences.english: Iris is an energetic and outgoing student.
sentences.chinese: 颖贤是一个有干劲和外向的学生。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, their energy and drive put me to shame.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这样，他们的精力和干劲还是使我觉得羞愧。

sentences.english: He is warmed by his success.
MM: It was hard for us to get up enough steam to finish the work in one day.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们鼓足干劲，要一天做完这个工作还是很难的。

sentences.english: Students are cleaning in campus, they are making the dust fly.
sentences.chinese: 学生们正在清扫校园，他们真是干劲冲天啊。

sentences.english: Michael was an extremely talented, high-energy, hard working entertainer.
sentences.chinese: 米高是一名具备天资，干劲十足，勤奋工作的艺人。

sentences.english: When it comes to drive, she's got more than any of us.
As soon as we arrived there,we ploughed into the work.
sentences.chinese: 我们一到那儿就干劲十足地干起来了。

sentences.english: You must be a fireball working with her.
sentences.chinese: 跟她在一起工作你一定是干劲十足吧？

definition: thoughts/what one has in one's heart
to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work
